import React from 'react'; import '../styles/global.css' import "../styles/collapsible.css" function Collapsible({ moduleDescription, files }) { return (
{moduleDescription}
{files.map((file, index) => (
  • {file.name}
    30 Aug
))}
) } export default Collapsible {/*
  • CS Capstone Explanatory Video
    30 Aug
  • Introduction to Inductive and Deductive Reasoning (Includes Activity)
    30 Aug
*/}
